issue.title: [CF 837] tellmewhen not loading
issue.body:
Hi,
i was really thrilled about trying this addon, really sounds great.
problem is im getting an error like someone wrote before when wow comes up:
"A complete restart of WoW is required to use TellMeWhen 6.2.1:
Class.lua was not found."
ofcourse i restarted the game and computer as well, reinstalled, used curse client install, nothing helped.
also i made sure that the file "Class.lua" does exsist in addon.
As i can see few people now got the same problem and i would love if it could be solved.
thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Drock1234 | Imported from CurseForge issue #837 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: FrameXML.log

FrameXML.log


> Posted by CurseForge user Drock1234

Give r838 a shot and see if that fixes the problem


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

you talking about ace3 r838? if yes than tried it now, didnt help... :(


> Posted by CurseForge user Drock1234

No. TellMeWhen r838. http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Has this solved the problem for you? Or have you not had a chance to test it yet?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Assuming this has been fixed since I haven't been getting any response from you and I haven't been getting any reports from other people on the issue either.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
